title: Can we possibly get the Japanese Voice Pack on the NA server?
body:
Just wondering if it would be possible for the Japanese VO pack to be available on the NA server? Nothing against the English VO just curious if anyone else felt the same. 

I just saw the behind the scenes video for the Riot Japan and the interviews with some of the voice actors. (Linked the video incase you guys have no clue what I'm talking about).

replies.body:
http://lexwah.com/lvoc/

Through a quick Google search, though I can't confirm it's legit.

Point is, the language pack should already be in the client. Just gotta replace your english set with whatever you want to use.

Yes that is the right one.
It is free and it works. No worry for viruses or malware, but keep in mind I have not used it in a while so I am not sure about the ''client breaking'' thing

I remember a long time ago when I first started playing, there was a downloadable voice pack that you could use that could change the in game voices of Champions, the announcer, etc to over 5 different languages.
I have downloaded it, but I have not used it in so long it got lost in time. I will edit my post if I find it or maybe someone else will post one
